articles.title: All In 1/13/20
articles.description: Chris Hayes discusses the day's top political news.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Lawrence's Last Word: I will sign anything that helps
articles.description: Why you can ignore the health care section of the presidential debate.
articles.content: MSNBC Daily: Subscribe and stay on top of impeachment news

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Freshman Dem debunks Trump claim about pre-existing conditions
articles.description: Freshman Rep. Lauren Underwood (D-IL) tells Lawrence O’Donnell that President Trump is making “empty promises” about protecting people with pre-existing conditions while promoting legislation to take away health care coverage for millions of Americans.
articles.content: Freshman Rep. Lauren Underwood (D-IL) tells Lawrence ODonnell that President Trump is making empty promises about protecting people with pre-existing conditions while promoting legislation to take away health care coverage for millions of Americans.Jan. 14, 2… [+2 chars]

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Schumer raises alarm about 'risks of war with this president'
articles.description: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer talks with Rachel Maddow about the push to pass a War Powers Act in the Senate to keep a check on what he sees as Donald Trump erratic and impulsive foreign policy and cynical political impulses.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Carville backs Bennet: He'll surprise people
articles.description: Presidential Candidate Sen. Michael Bennet (D-CO) joins Lawrence O'Donnell and reacts to being endorsed by Veteran Democratic Strategist James Carville, who was behind former President Clinton’s 1992 campaign.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Schumer 'feeling better' about possibility of fair impeachment trial
articles.description: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer talks with Rachel Maddow about the complexities of what Donald Trump's impeachment means for different senators, but admits that recent news makes him more hopeful of a fair Senate trial that includes witnesses and documen…

articles.title: ‘Looking at something pretty big’: Russia hacked Ukraine company at center of impeachment
articles.description: The New York Times reports that Russia hacked Burisma, the Ukrainian gas company that is central to the impeachment of Trump. Nicole Perlroth, one of the reporters who broke that story, tells Lawrence O'Donnell that Russia is also using spies in the

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: New questions about Russia and Trump as he faces trial in the Senate
articles.description: Was Moscow seeking dirt on the Bidens that could aid Trump’s impeachment defense – and his re-election bid? Peter Baker, Jill Colvin, and Philip Rucker join.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: NYT: Russia hacked Ukrainian company at center of impeachment case
articles.description: One day before Speaker Pelosi meets with Democrats to finalize the transfer of impeachment articles, new reporting reveals Moscow’s cyberattack on the firm linked to the Ukraine scandal.

articles.title: Schiff: investigation of new Trump impeachment evidence continues

articles.title: Rep. Schiff: NYT new Russian hacking report 'deeply disturbing'
